short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow you to play points sound without giving or taking points.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ClassDojo Sound Manager Button Chrome extension adds a convenient "Play Sound" button directly to the ClassDojo interface. This button allows teachers and users to play specific sounds through the ClassDojo platformâ€™s sound manager with a single click. Perfect for enhancing classroom interactions and quickly triggering audio cues.
